label9: With the JX600 camera's simple screen design, menus are easy to use
label5: 14 million pixel sensor that produces high-quality, low-noise results at sensitivities of up to ISO 3200 (not available at some image sizes)
label6: Its 5x optical zoom lens and image stabilization let you capture every moment with reduced camera and subject blur
label7: Automatic Scene Recognition (SR Auto) chooses optimum camera settings for the best images of any scene
focusrange: Wide: 1.6' (48.77 cm) - Infinity Telephoto: 2.9' (88.39 cm) - Infinity Wide Macro: 3.9" (9.91 cm) - 2.6' (79.25 cm) Tele Macro: 2.6' (79.25 cm) - 4.2' (1.28 m)
weight: Approx. 113g / 3.9oz. (including battery and memory card), Approx. 97g / 3.4oz. (excluding battery and memory card)
label19: Other playback functions of the JX600 include Micro thumbnail view, easy web uploading to YouTube and FACEBOOK, and Photobook Assist
label10: Bright, clear high-resolution 2.7-inch, 230K-dot LCD monitor is easy to read so camera setup is quick and straightforward
label16: The camera features advanced movie editing including "movie trimming" to cut unwanted footage from movies, and "movie join" to join multiple separate clips into a single movie
label14: Record High Definition movies (1280 x 720 pixels) with movie scene recognition function that chooses optimum settings for your environment
label15: Dedicated Movie recording button lets you go from taking photos to shooting movies at the press of a button
focallength: f=4.6mm - 23mm, equivalent to 26 - 130mm on a 35mm format
label64: 2.7-inch, approx. 230K-dot, TFT colour LCD monitor, approx. 96% coverage
label20: Includes rechargeable battery that charges when the camera is connected via USB
photographyfunctions: SR AUTO, Face Detection, Blink detection, Framing guideline, Frame No. memory, Date stamp, Motion Panorama, Individual shutter 3D, Recording movie in the SR AUTO
fileformatstillimage: JPEG (Exif Ver 2.3) (Design rule for Camera File system compliant / DPOF-compatible), 3D still image
label44: * ISO 3200 is effective in image size S.
focusmode: Single AF / Continuous AF (SR AUTO, Movie)
playbackfunctions: Face Detection, Photobook assist, Image search, Erase selected frames, Slide show, Protect, Crop, Resize, Image rotate, Mark for upload, Multi-frame playback (with Microthumbnail), Motion Panorama, Favorite, Movie edit
whitebalancemodes: Fine, Shade, Fluorescent light (Daylight), Fluorescent light (Warm White), Fluorescent light (Cool White), Incandescent light
preset: Fine, Shade, Fluorescent light (Daylight), Fluorescent light (Warm White), Fluorescent light (Cool White), Incandescent light
